traits.name: Brave
entries: Liara has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Flaming Fury
entries: Once per turn, when Liara hits a creature with a melee weapon, she can cause fire to magically erupt from her weapon and deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage to the target.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
